import React ,{useContext,useState}from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/notesContext"; const AddNote = () => { const context = useContext(noteContext); const {addNote} = context; const [note, setnote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:"general"}) const handleClick = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); addNote(note.title,note.description); } const handleChange = (e)=>{ setnote({...note,[e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } return (

Enter a Note

) } export default AddNote
